sentences.en: Apart from two men on watch in the engine-room, everyone was asleep.
sentences.cn: 除了两个人在机房值班外，其他人都在睡觉。

sentences.en: Arnold stopped the engine and got out of the car.
sentences.cn: 阿诺德关掉发动机，下了车。

sentences.en: In 1941, the train would have been pulled by a steam engine.
sentences.cn: 1941年，火车本可以由蒸汽机车拉动。

sentences.en: Jake's head jerked up at the throb of the engine.
sentences.cn: 听到发动机的轰鸣声，杰克猛地抬起了头。

sentences.en: Some objects had got entangled with the underneath mechanism of the engine.
sentences.cn: 一些东西缠在了发动机下面的机件上。

sentences.en: The boat's engine misfired after he tried to start it up.
sentences.cn: 他试着启动船的引擎，但没发动起来。

sentences.en: The engine note changed as the aircraft landed, taxied and halted.
sentences.cn: 发动机的声音随着飞机着陆、滑行和停下一直在变化。

sentences.en: The engine of one landing craft was still running.
sentences.cn: 一艘登陆艇的发动机还在运转。

sentences.en: The GM diesel engine shunted the coaches to Platform 4.
sentences.cn: 通用柴油动力火车头将车厢转轨到了4号月台。

sentences.en: Then abruptly he revved the engine to full power.
sentences.cn: 然后他突然加速到最大马力。

sentences.en: There were also several accidents mainly caused by engine failures on take-off.
sentences.cn: 还有几次事故主要是起飞时引擎出现故障造成的。

sentences.en: Two of them got out to fiddle around with the engine.
sentences.cn: 其中两人下车鼓捣引擎。

sentences.en: Very slowly he moved forward, the engine ticking over.
sentences.cn: 他慢慢往前开，发动机低速运转。

sentences.en: Water in the engine compartment is sucked away by a hose.
sentences.cn: 发动机舱里的水由一条软管抽走。

sentences.en: We were stranded with engine trouble on a deserted highway.
sentences.cn: 我们因发动机故障而被困在空无一人的公路上。

sentences.en: When I started the engine it sparked, fizzed and went dead.
sentences.cn: 我刚发动引擎时，引擎冒出火星，发出长长的嘶声，然后就熄火了。

phrases.tran_cn: 内燃机；燃烧机；内燃机燃烧机
发动机转速度；引擎转速
摩托车发动机；摩托车引擎
n. 火箭发动机；火箭引擎

trans.tran_en: the part of a vehicle that produces power to make it move
